src:
Gregor Kapferer

07 Nov 2019, 14:12

Gregor Kapferer est Senior Portfolio Manager dans le domaine Fixed Income au sein de Swiss Life Asset Managers, dans la division Third Party Asset Management. Dans le cadre de cette fonction, il assure l’analyse des marchés Fixed Income et l’implémentation des stratégies de portefeuille dans les affaires quotidiennes.
text:
Gregor Kapferer

07 Nov 2019, 14:12

Gregor Kapferer is Senior Portfolio Manager in Fixed Income at Swiss Life Asset Managers in the Third Party Asset Management division. In this role, he provides analysis of Fixed Income markets and the implementation of portfolio strategies in day-to-day business.
